about_the_game:
Step into the world of Tradeforge, a unique game that blends the art of crafting with the challenges of trading. As a skilled craftsman and savvy merchant, you begin your journey in a medieval town on the brink of the industrial revolution. Your mission is to gather resources, forge valuable items, and sell them in a dynamic market where supply and demand are constantly shifting.

In Tradeforge, success hinges on skill, strategy, and timing. Will you gather the right resources at the right time? Can you keep a sharp eye on the market to sell your goods at the highest prices while expanding your workshop and refining your skills?

Features:


  • Crafting and Forging: Utilize your craftsmanship to create weapons, tools, jewelry, and other valuable items. Every piece you forge can influence the fate of your trading empire.
  • Dynamic Market: Prices fluctuate based on supply and demand. Stay alert and sell your goods at the best possible price to maximize your profits.
  • Expandable Workshop: Build and upgrade your forge, improve your tools, and discover new recipes to create increasingly valuable items.
  • Atmospheric Setting: Enjoy detailed pixel art graphics that bring the medieval life and industrial progress to life with rich colors and textures.
  • Trade, Forge, Dominate: In Tradeforge, you choose whether to become a master craftsman renowned for your top-quality products or a shrewd merchant who dominates the market. Every decision counts, and every deal brings you closer to the top of the trading world.

Are you ready to master the art of trade and craft? Step into the world of Tradeforge and forge your legacy!

Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8,10,11
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 1250 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • VR Support: No
